select xc.id, xc.name, xc.price, xc.useyear, xc.uselong, xc.createtime, xc.hot, xc.del, xc.paint, xc.recommend, xc.accident b.name brand, e.name entity, c.name color, t.name type, y.name caryear,
FROM xys_car xc LEFT JOIN xys_brand b ON b.id = xc.brand LEFT JOIN xys_entity e ON xc.entity = e.id LEFT JOIN xys_color c ON c.id = xc.color LEFT JOIN xys_type t ON t.id = xc.type LEFT JOIN caryear y ON y.id = xc.xys_caryear
